name: You Don't Know Tom Anymore
description:
Miles is a lonely twenty-something who has spent most of his post-university life online. He can't completely quit playing the dying MMO where he first met his best friend, Tom. Especially not after Tom stops replying to his messages a few days before Christmas.

Struggling over whether or not he should be worried, Miles returns to the game, only to find that Tom never left.

When he realises that Tom doesn't want anything to do with him anymore, Miles has to find a way back into his friend's life. Any way that will work.


You Don't Know Tom Anymore is an interactive narrative about the way we view other people, and the things that can happen when our perspective doesn't align with reality. It's a horror story for anyone who turns to the internet for company, even if they shouldn't.

Features:
- Alternate endings.
- Original pixel artwork.
- A 10,000+ word script.
